data.prayer: Father, guide the church in Kandhamal, Odisha, India to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Kandhamal, Odisha, India
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 8,064 believers in Kandhamal to start simple multiplying churches in their homes.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, you desire the people in the county of Kandhamal who are far from you to hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.prayer: Lord, we pray for the believers in Kandhamal, Odisha, India to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Bhadayi people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Kandhamal, Odisha, India.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

data.prayer: Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Kandhamal. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.

data.section_summary:
the county of Kandhamal, Odisha, India has a population of 733,100.

We estimate Kandhamal has 8,064 people who might know Jesus, 8,895 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 716,141 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Please, teach the 8,064 believers in Kandhamal, Odisha, India how to pray to you and how to listen for your voice. That they might follow you into the good works you have prepared for them.
data.verse: My sheep listen to my voice; I know them, and they follow me.
